autoDialog.title: TOTP limit reached
autoDialog.message: You're currently synchronizing your TOTPs and have exceeded the limit of $count TOTPs before having to subscribe to the Contributor Plan. So you have to either store them locally (which means, no more synchronization), or to subscribe to the Contributor Plan.

addDialog.title: TOTP limit reached
addDialog.message: You're currently synchronizing your TOTPs and have a limit of $count TOTPs before having to subscribe to the Contributor Plan. So you have to either store them locally (which means, no more synchronization), or to subscribe to the Contributor Plan in order to add another TOTP.
